lender.name: Bobz
lender.loan_because: I may help someone to provide for their family....an extended way to help children.
lender.occupational_info: I do a variety of work, but mostly I am a foster parent who has adopted some of the children that I care for. This is a full time job.

lender.name: Bunmi
lender.loan_because: Microlending is cool...and likely the key to empowering up and coming entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: I create value by creating something people want, and in return hope to receive value

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: This is an incredibly creative way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with adolescents, adults, couples, and families. My goal is to help them have better relationships and more satisfying lives.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea and anything I can do to help somebody rise up and accomplish what they want; I'm all for! I've been looking for something like this for a long time and finally found Kiva, thanks to PBS.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: ashley
lender.loan_because: What I can give is nothing compared to what I get in return

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help someone who works hard and with a loan can grow their business to help their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to make doctor's appointments with specialists.

lender.name: Prescott
lender.loan_because: It is what we are supposed to do, help others out.
lender.occupational_info: I help to provide equality in environments to allow people to improve their lives.

lender.name: David
lender.occupation: on site Fleet PM and Wash
lender.occupational_info: oil change on company Vehicles and equipment

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I'm just passing along what has always been so freely given to me... Blessings & Opportunities... It's what one does with those two things... that become the gifts back to me

lender.name: DEVIN
lender.loan_because: I believe it's so important to try to be a blessing to others. Helping people by giving them the resources to be self sufficient for themselves and their families is a great way to not only take a step toward ending poverty but it also allows a person to possess the esteem that comes with being able to provide for their family. Helping a person achieve his/her ambition or dream (of business ownership) that leads to self fulfillment is a movement in the right direction to fighting poverty and spreading blessings to others.

lender.name: Nicolas, Jr.
lender.loan_because: I need more capital, US$3,000, to buy and resell local products to generate employment in the rural areas
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell locally produced and manufactured products for retail at an outlet near the Airport. It's a showcase which also offers wholesale prices to other entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do! and really why not?

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I have too much money
lender.occupational_info: uh... what work?

lender.name: Julio
lender.loan_because: I was raised in a low income community in North Philadelphia, PA. I see the need to help other accomplish thier life goals.
lender.occupational_info: I assist low income families with federal assistance when pruchasing thier first home.

lender.name: Laurence
lender.loan_because: Small donations made by many people can create large changes in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I manage all of the companies and people that are needed to construct a building.

lender.name: Olive & Alice
lender.loan_because: we are all family.

lender.name: Louisa
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to give back to the Community and help individuals who are trying to improve their situation.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I believe in a better future.
lender.occupational_info: I work towards a clean energy future.

lender.name: Keisuke
lender.loan_because: it's my business.

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: Eases the ole conscience a little bit, and this way you know for sure that you are helping someone directly
lender.occupational_info: I work in finance, normally lending out other peoples money to people who want to pay off their credit cards or go on holiday, so its kinda nice to be able to give our my own money for something slightly less shallow

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed tremendously and I love helping others. While I'll never get to meet these wonderful people...I share their entrepreneurial spirit and their passion to make something work. How exciting to be a part of something so wonderful! Thank you Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I'm an advocate for diversity and lover of people. I fight against racism and inequality. I educate children, adults...anyone who will listen!

lender.name: Doris
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: we all need a little help from each other.

lender.name: AlexanderDSM
lender.occupational_info: I'm an ambitious young person. I was elected to City Council at age 21, started 4 businesses before graduating college, and serve on various philanthropic boards and organizations.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I feel like Kiva can actually help people.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a library helping people find things.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: We are to love one another.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: this is such a simple way to make a difference in peoples' lives

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: making a donation feeds a person in the short term - but creating a business feeds many families in the long term.

lender.name: Yenchi
lender.loan_because: I can and I would like to.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: What I consider a small amount can change a life - not by giving but by empowering someone to build a better life. As a student of economics, I enjoy being able to make a difference and apply some great principles.
lender.occupational_info:
I work within a large organization, where even still, small amounts can make huge differences.
Both my parents built their own businesses and I consider myself to have some entrepreneurial spirit.

lender.name: MELANIE
lender.loan_because: I think owning a business is very rewarding and also very challenging. Sometimes- even the smallest bit of help can be the boost you need to get your business from one level to the next. I have been so fortunate to have people help me in my busines along the way... I would love to do that for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I own and work at San Diego Bay Flower Company in San Diego, California USA. It is a small retail floral and gift shop. We sell beautiful flowers as well as hand made and local artesian gift ware, cards and stationery.

lender.name: Kris Tan
lender.loan_because: I believe that providing people the means to help themselves is one of the greatest gifts that we can humbly and joyfully provide.
lender.occupational_info: Happy but humble grunt in a local Private Equity Firm. :)

lender.name: Emmanouil
lender.loan_because: I think it helps
lender.occupational_info: dealing on creation or manipulation of pictures, images, visual things of many kinds

lender.name: Joseph A. Vieira
lender.loan_because:
From an entrepreneur to entrepreneur:
I loan because I want to elevate the economy status. Nothing can go wrong when a positive contribution is made. I am all for social enterprise, social justice and social change.
It is a good feeling.
lender.occupational_info: I am a serial entrepreneur who is never satisfied. I chase and create opportunities that are social-centered aims to make a place better.

lender.name: Augustine Family
lender.loan_because: We believe in people. Their determination to better themselves, their family and their community.
lender.occupational_info: We renovate homes and work spaces to fit the needs and wants of the individual(s). We do everything from framing, drywall, painting, construction, demolition, electrical, plumbing, landscaping, etc.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I think microcredit is one of the most powerful ways to fight poverty in the world. This organization connects people in a constructive way.

lender.name: Junji & Misako
lender.loan_because: this is what we can do. We've been fortunate, it's our turn to give it back.

lender.name: Wolfgang
lender.loan_because: Holding a university degree in Business Studies gives me a special view on all kind of financial transactions and business in general. Microfinance did attract me in the first minute I did read about. In 2007 a friend of mine showed me an article about Kiva in a newspaper in Hong Kong and the concept is simply perfect to connect people like me to people who can take a huge advantage of such a "small" (at least for me) loan. A "small" piece to make our world a bit better.
lender.occupational_info: I work for IBM Germany with clients interested in software solutions from IBM.

lender.name: Tommy
lender.loan_because: I believe providing loans is a sustainable solution compared to simple donation of money. I believe and hope in a future, where fewer people will be dependent on Kiva and other similar organizations.
lender.occupational_info: PhD student in biochemistry (protein dynamics and structural bioinformatics).

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: My country enforces trade rules designed to prevent economic growth in other countries. Kiva is a small step to undoing these restrictions.
lender.occupational_info: I develop websites such as: http://www.blackgoldmovie.com/

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of individuals to create better futures for themselves, their families, and their communities. Through the lottery of birth, I have been blessed with opportunity. I want to share my blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I help agency clients understand complexities of environmental authorities, assisting with regulatory laws that protect the fisheries of the West Coast of the United States.

lender.name: Breanna & Daryl
lender.loan_because: We can.

lender.name: The Oates Family
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be able to.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I work as part of a team to make health care more affordable to everyone.

lender.name: Bent
lender.loan_because: People around the world need help - do not wait for our governments to act on our behalf - let's take action ourselves.

lender.name: natalie
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: very demanding, but fun

lender.name: MARGARET E
lender.loan_because: I can help other women.
lender.occupational_info: I lead Christian worship. I take care of the people in our small congregation. I also go to school [graphic design]. I am 67 years old.

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because: its a tiny step towards making the world a better place

lender.name: Malcolm
lender.loan_because: I do alright for myself and want to see others do well for themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help organisations use energy more efficiently.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It’s nice to feel connected with genuine human beings.
lender.occupational_info: preserving and planting trees in an urban environment

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: it is easy to say people should help themselves, but it is better to help where possible
lender.occupational_info: I am an Aviation Supply Analyst with a multi-national corporation.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: It could be me.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I would like to think that if I were in the same situation as these hard-working entrepreneurs, that someone would care enough to help me improve my life.
lender.occupational_info: I help to restore maximum mobility and function to dogs which have suffered from injury or surgery.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to give back
lender.occupational_info: In-Home day care, especially geared towards young women working and pursuing education goals.

lender.name: Mens Group
lender.occupational_info: We are the Men's Group of the Los Angeles synagogue: Ohr HaTorah

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I’ve been lucky to have people believe in me, and now I believe in people too. We all have a dream, and who wouldn't like a little help with it?
lender.occupational_info: I work for a major airline in Canada

lender.name: Vickie
lender.loan_because: It's a small amount to help change someone's life in another country.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: I feel the need to help others directly having benefited so much from the way of life I had.
lender.occupational_info: I run a business unit in a public software industry. The software helps companies communicate with their customers globally. I am responsible for strategy, sales, marketing and consulting.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I grew up in the Philippines and saw poverty all the time. I hate seeing the poor get poorer, and the rich get richer. Because I know that compared the the rest of the world I'm rich, I want to help others and "be the change I want to see." - Ghandi

lender.name: artvoid
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: RS Family
lender.occupation: a material handler, a seamstress & a 7yo
lender.loan_because: We are all neighbors.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: No one can get through this life alone, everyone needs a helping hand. I hope my small donations offer that to someone's dream.
lender.occupational_info: I bake sweets and make celebration cakes for people who want to make their occasions extraordinary.

lender.name: Holly
lender.occupation: stay at home mom, part time student

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: Its the one thing I can do to directly have an impact.
lender.occupational_info: I negotiate contracts with companies that want to buy products and services

lender.name: marc
lender.occupation: production director on an advertising agency

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can help someone further theirselves and their family in a better life.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to have a better life

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: I wanted to make an impact on the world rather than just teaching about it. My classes and my teaching philosophy has emphasized being active in the world rather than just sitting back and saying, "That's terrible" or "That shouldn't happen".

lender.name: Rodrigo
lender.occupation: Contracts & Billing Manager for a Non-Profit

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: Having been a small business owner in the past, I understand the responsibility and admire the courage to undertake it.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I feel it is everyone's birthright to experience joy and prosperity on this vast, wonderful planet earth. By my helping others, my hope is that they will also find joy and prosperity as they receive these loans.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the largest manufacturer of commercial aircraft. My job is working with the computer software application for our manufacturing and purchasing end users. I write processes, training documents and assist the end users when they have trouble in the system.

lender.name: Snowdrift Farm
lender.loan_because: We are the customers and employees of Snowdrift Farm. We loan because we want to help those in need develop and deliver on their goals -- and because it feels good!
lender.occupational_info: Snowdrift Farm is a leading distributor and manufacturer of materials used to make handcrafted soaps, cosmetics and body care products, such as essential and fragrance oils, fixed oils and fine ingredients. We ship worldwide.

lender.name: Tom and Gabriella
lender.loan_because:
Ye men of Thebes, behold this Œdipus, Who knew the famous riddle and was noblest, Who envied no one’s fortune and success. And, lo,! in what a sea of direst woe
He now is plunged. From hence the lesson draw, To reckon no man happy till ye see The closing day; until he pass the bourn Which severs life from death, unscathed by woe.

lender.name: Pauline
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life. I believe in helping any way I can. Kiva provides an amazing simple way to get involved.

lender.name: Tetsuo
lender.loan_because: I believe all people in the world equally have right to live in happy, so I think I would do something to do for "us".
lender.occupational_info: My work is to procure the valious kinds of materials from all over the world for manufacturing industrial products.

lender.name: Cony H.S. German Club
lender.loan_because: Our organization promotes community service. We see this as an opportunity to serve the global community.
lender.occupational_info: We are students in grades 9-12 who are learning German.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in so many ways I cannot refuse to share these things with those who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: I study Spanish, philosophy, and sciences. I hope to eventually attend medical school but my more short term goals include traveling the world, learning new languages, and serving people!

lender.name: Kory
lender.loan_because: I believe in what goes around comes around; I believe we can all work together to make the world a better place for everyone in it.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a daycare director in an isolated community. I oversee staff that cares for children ages 0-6 years old.

lender.name: Anne & Kathy
lender.loan_because: our spare change can change lives, and we are happy to share it.

lender.name: The Vandergrift Team
lender.loan_because: One of our Team values is to give freely of our time, talent and treasure. Thank you for providing us with this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Each and every one of us on our team has a deep desire to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: My life is full of so many blessings, I want to give to those where and when I can. We are all one.
lender.occupational_info: I am lucky enough to love what I do and by being myself on television it helps to convey that being yourself is a blessing in itself.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I want to support Entrepreneurs in developing countries as well as those in high tech.
lender.occupational_info: I work with high tech start up companies and Entrepreneurs in the western US. My focus is fund raising and business development.

lender.name: Primelia
lender.loan_because: **dreams are for everyone**
lender.occupational_info: **sharing memories from the past**

lender.name: Monica
lender.occupation: Military Wife, USO Volunteer, small business owner
lender.loan_because: I feel that we can help our firneds in the world one loan at a time!!
lender.occupational_info: I am a military wife, a USO full time Volunteer, and small business owner.

lender.name: Debbie Zipp
lender.loan_because: it is a very important part of living a significant life. I think the concept behind KIVA is a brilliant way to give. You are giving the gift of empowerment. You are giving the gift of making a dream come true. What could be better!
lender.occupational_info: My main focus right now is producing films that celebrate the power of women over 40. My production company, my website and it's short films are dedicated to empowering women over 40 but I believe it also resonates with all women.

lender.name: Jacques
lender.loan_because: "No man is so poor as to have nothing worth giving. Give what you have. To someone it may be better than you dare to think." - - Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I loan because this is a small way for me to help others around the world while I am in school studying to become a teacher and hoping to create positive change.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I've been around the world and seen great poverty. This is a simple way I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I write specifications for clothing. I work with factories to get samples that we will review for construction/fit and approve to get production started. I also go to the factories to review the garments in production.

lender.name: Fawn
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help where I know exactly to whom my money is going to.
lender.occupational_info: Science research for books.

lender.name: keeley
lender.loan_because: as a canadian citizen, i am one of the luckiest women on earth. In order to honour this, I am obligated to participate in the global community, and help create a better world than we live in today.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life. Helping others makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my days taking care of my home and family. I organize finances, cook, clean, shop, and drive my children to their activities.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I love knowing someone else is benefiting and living better by the humbling kindness of other peoples hearts.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Emergency Medical Technician for the US Army. We live in New Mexico, but are from Orange County, CA.

lender.name: Chef Doug
lender.loan_because: I heard about this through an NPR program interviewing Bill Clinton and I believe in Bill Clinton.
lender.occupational_info: I am a chef at Au Pied De Cochon restaurant, Hotel Intercontinental, Atlanta, GA. and I practice law.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: This is a GREAT way to directly help people one at a time, person to person, with no goverment waste and red tape..and NO Bank Greed...Thanks Kiva

lender.name: Nitin
lender.loan_because: The idea of helping realize someone's dream had a powerful impact on me.
lender.occupational_info: My work revolves around Internet technologies, their implementation and scalability.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: I was given a chance to get my business going over 15 years ago and I saw this as the perfect way to "pay it forward". What this organization does is both logical and brilliant at the same time. What an inspiring and meaningfull way to make a difference and see the results.
lender.occupational_info: I am a transportation broker or in simpler terms an intermediary between customers who need their products moved and the trucking companies that are looking for the loads.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: A little help from us goes a long, long way - Yay!!

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I was born in the right place at the right time. Therefore I have an obligation to assist those who weren't.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that the people employed in my company are in the right positions at the right place at the right time.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Residential real estate sales in Indianapolis Indiana.

lender.name: Josefin
lender.loan_because: I want to help others improve their lives.

lender.name: Ann B
lender.occupational_info: making scientific and technical information easy to understand.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: Life should center around giving with enthusiasm and receiving with humility.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have been in the restaurant business for 25 years. We opened our first restaurant with the help of friends who believed in us and would like to pass that on to others.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I am thoroughly convinced that this business model can change the world. It's not a hand out, it's an interest free loan (the way it should be) to someone who has already shown initiative by even applying for a loan.....
lender.occupational_info: I help solve problems. My passion is in business development, but I send the majority of my time doing corporate communications projects.

lender.name: Juliette
lender.loan_because: The first time I went to Cuba I left everything I brought with me on the Island. I came home, went to a salad bar for lunch and cried. At the abundance and the food that would probably go to waste. It makes me both sad and proud to be an American.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with drug and alcohol problems.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: develop and build new energy resources such as wind, solar, and small hydroelectric

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work to fulfill enjoyment to the world.

lender.name: Alpha Financial
lender.loan_because: Would like to help make the World a better place, so less will be expected of tomorrow's leaders.
lender.occupational_info: We loan, and invest money. We assist in business consultation, exclusivley over the Internet.

lender.name: Mary
lender.occupational_info: I help people whose animals have been poisoned.

lender.name: Richard Winchester
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lender.name: Marianne McCarthy
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful and empowering program! It is great enjoyment to help and watch people to get an opportunity to make a better living for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: God answers prayers every day from the most unlikely places in the most unexpected way. All we have to do is knock and someone will open the door.
lender.occupational_info: Have Faith That Your Prayer Will Be Answered.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: Former member of the shoe, clothing retail industry.

lender.name: Lunar
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference

lender.name: Jonas
lender.loan_because: I believe that supporting entrepreneurship and personal initiative is a great way to create sustainable wealth.
lender.occupational_info: Aerospace consultant.

lender.name: Sunil
lender.loan_because: I get inspired from people who want to achieve, do something to stand on their own feet inspite of difficulties life throws at them. These people's lives,dreams and the effort they put in to realize their dreams and the hope that my infinitesimal contributions help somebody to realize their dreams make me do this
lender.occupational_info: I build software that facilitates people to use internet

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: I want to participate in the creation of wealth all over the world
lender.occupational_info: I work with individuals with physical and intellectual disabilities.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help other people get a little head start on a better life for them and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I do all sorts of painting and decorating

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: I want all of my donation to be received, and I want it to be able to help people to help themselves, not cause them to remain dependent.
lender.occupational_info: I work in media and communications for a development NGO, but have been lending through Kiva long before I started working in this sector. I'm also freelance write for magazines, including Good mag (NZ), Idealog and New Zealand Marketing mag.

lender.name: Una
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I was lucky to have the opportunities i have had, i want to pass on the chance to be successful to others. I want someone across the globe to know someone is cheering on their success.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupation: Stay-at-home mom and Creative Memories Consultant
lender.loan_because: The current loan I made is in memory of my dad who died of cancer this year. He was a missionary in Guatemala when I was a kid and helped people in that exact area.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: There is no greater gift to give than to offer help to someone in need. What a wonderful way to lend a helping hand to our brothers and sisters all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people with their finances and help them make sound investments and choose proper products to fit their needs on a long term basis.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone has the same value.
lender.occupational_info: I look after people who are ill. I have spend time in Africa and saw first hand the health needs of the continent.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to help other female entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: It feels good!

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: "We make a living by what we get. We make a life by what we give." Winston Churchill

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: God directs me to help others
lender.occupational_info: I work in the home as a mother of two young children.

lender.name: Susan & family
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful to help others help themselves. "Because I have been given much, I, too, must give."

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I knew that I wanted to help when I saw the KIVA episode on Oprah. There is great power and satisfaction in making your own business decisions and because I have been blessed by God, I wanted to share that blessing with others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I manage an office in a family-owned business that works on airport runways.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I was given a loan as a gift and it seems such a good idea that really works.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who are recovering from mental illness.

lender.name: KATHLEEN
lender.loan_because: Because the good Lord has given me so much I cant find it in my heart to refuse to donate
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office and file many papers in files all day long. i make copies some times and send faxes (electronic photo copies) to other offices.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: there are so many good people that have great and wonderful intentions and they just need a little help to make dreams come true.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: it is the responsibility of the fortunate to help the less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to adult immigrants here in California.

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: it's easy and will make a difference in someone's life. Everyone should do it!

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it can at times to feed a family and provide a home for them.
lender.occupational_info: I care for my grandson most afternoons.Also I help my mom with her daily tasks and cared for my dad before he died.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: I get paid to be creative.

lender.name: Jay Massey
lender.loan_because: When we needed help and asked for help, people helped us. When we needed help and did not ask for help, people helped us. Now it's our turn.
lender.occupational_info: The company I started builds and markets web sites in the US and Canada. It is very involved with entrepreneurial development in our local area through a program called Coco Cares, Kiva leverages our entrepreneurial support globally.

lender.name: JNSR
lender.loan_because: We want to share our good fortune, Namaste

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed as a business owner and want to pass on this blessing to others. This is just one way I can help others helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people fix their computer problems so that they can use their computer for business and to keep in touch with family and friends.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who are helping themselves and showing a desire to make their lives better.

lender.name: Stevens Family
lender.loan_because: It is the best way to do the most good.
lender.occupational_info: we do money counting for a restaurant company and teach people how to use computers

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the market to transform people's lives in a meaningful and sustainable way. This is the ultimate example of giving someone a hand up, not a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a reporter for a large public broadcasting organisation, specialising in news about the South Pacific islands region.

lender.name: Sellitto Foundation
lender.loan_because: We want the world to Succeed!

lender.name: Nanette and Rick
lender.loan_because: Through Kiva, we hope to repay in a small way the kindness, generosity and compassion we have been shown by so many people.

lender.name: Kacee
lender.loan_because: I want to make this world a better place. If I can give a small portion to help someone live a better life I will. Its better to give a hand up than a hand out and this allows someone an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own a catering company.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: it's a good way to get money to people who need it and will use it to make an honest living.
lender.occupational_info: I help out in a pharmacy.

lender.name: Jorge & Maria
lender.loan_because: We want to help others who haven't had the opportunities that we have had.

lender.name: Ilona
lender.loan_because: I want to help and this a great way and chance to do it.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: i can and its the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: www.freetenzin.org www.survival-international.org www.angola3.org www.savedelara.com www.savejapandolphins.org www.lifenets.net

lender.name: Pam and Tom
lender.loan_because: We have had good fortune. We want to share that with our brothers and sisters.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university, helping people to receive teaching certificates. My husband works for a pharmaceutical company, helping scientists invent medicines faster by using computers.

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: "Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending" -Carl Bard

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I hope that in some small way I can help to empower others to make their lives better. If we all contribute a little, perhaps collectively we can make a positive difference in our world.
lender.occupational_info: Mompreneur of a Marketing and Communications business, a partner in a Digital Asset Management company and most importantly a MOM!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It helps others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an administrator at a university.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: It is exciting for me to help those with a plan for success. I was so moved when I heard of Kiva only a few weeks ago, I had to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse and work in the recovery room waking up people from surgery. I also am a student studying for my Master's degree in Nursing.

lender.name: lisa
lender.loan_because: I know a little boost can help make things happen! Best wishes to you and your families....
lender.occupational_info: I work with teens and I am also the creator of www.listography.com and the Listography books.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: The smallest good deed is better than the grandest intention.
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations and groups of people envision new possibilities and work together more effectively.

lender.name: James and Sharon
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Working with devopmentally disabled adults

lender.name: Zandrea
lender.loan_because: I wouldn't be where I am today without loans from many different sources and I am forever grateful. Now I have an opportunity to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse for a non-profit on a team that serves the needs of clients that are severely mentally ill. We work to support our clients in the community so they do bounce back and forth in the hospital system.

lender.name: Marieke
lender.loan_because: It is so easy to help someone in need. I spent two weeks in Namibia in 2004 on a mission/care and compassion trip with my church and returned determined to help in any way I can. I'm so glad I heard about Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I am a language teacher to 13-18 year old students.

lender.name: Danaka
lender.loan_because: I want people to benefit from their hard work and dedication.

lender.name: Shannon Plummer
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed throughout my life in so many ways and it's always nicer to give than to receive!
lender.occupational_info: I photograph nature and wildlife in an attempt to educate the public about the natural beauty of this world and how it needs to be protected.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea. Plus you can see exactly where your contribution is going.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home and also operate a small website

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: $25 is a low enough ammount for me to afford, and enough to really help someone who needs it. I know it's going to good use, unlike donating to big charity companies who keep the majority of your donations for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I run an ammusement park. This involves monitoring 10 acres of rides for adults and children, as well as up to 30 employess across the entire area. We do many children's birthday parties as well as events for local companies.

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: a friend in need is a friend indeed!

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: we are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English literature to amazing high school students.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I love helping people, I truly do. I know that is probably the standard answer but I really enjoy imparting a little joy in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I tell pilots where to go and how to get there safely.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like to know that what I do with my money is going to help real people who are working to improve themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I answer phones for a bank and help customers resolve financial issues.

lender.name: Maritza & Andreas
lender.loan_because: Pay it forward :-)

lender.name: Kyoko
lender.loan_because: there is someone who needs a help just right there and this is what I could just right here at the moment.

lender.name: Man-Sheung
lender.loan_because: my momma didn't raise no fool

lender.name: Dan
lender.occupational_info: I study brain aging in people over the age of 90.

lender.name: RTZ University
lender.loan_because: We want to make an IMPACT on the world

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by Muhammad Yunus. Kiva lets me know who and what I am helping and it is exciting and rewarding to be able to help.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I hope that it will have an impact on the future growth and create financial opportunity for others.
lender.occupational_info: We help people plan for current and future income needs.

lender.name: Fabio
lender.loan_because: Life has given very much to me and I would like to give something in return.

lender.name: Clifford
lender.loan_because: I am age 74 & retired from full time work .I enjoy giving small entreperneurs the opportunity to improve their way of life in a practical and dignified way
lender.occupational_info: Retired but working 3 months during Kiwifruit harvest, assisting in fruit analysis laboratory.

lender.name: Marja
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to.
lender.occupational_info: Data warehousing and business intelligence

lender.name: Tico & Mary
lender.loan_because: "Poverty is the worst form of violence". Mahatma Gandhi

lender.name: Angelica
lender.loan_because: "I complained because I had no shoes until I met someone who had no feet." - Anon
lender.occupational_info: I'm just a drop in the ocean.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I loan because everyone needs capital to manage their lives and businesses. I loan because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired business person. I am also a farmer who grows grapes. We have around 50 different kinds, most are not normally or have never been growen in Ohio before. I am also starting a small breeding program.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: Teacher

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because:
I've been involved in ICT in developing countries for some time. I have paid particular attention to the Pacific Islands.
I'm loaning because this is a great way to make things work. Many hands make light work.
lender.occupational_info:
I run a second hand bookstore in Wellington, New Zealand and on the Internet. It is a family business that we use to have a good time, keep the landlord happy, and have a meal from time to time.
I would be delighted to help someone in a developing country set up their own second hand bookshop.

lender.name: K
lender.loan_because: I'm striving to be a better humanist. Plus, it feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I do textile based artwork.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving and it's benefits for the receiver as well as the giver. We can only benefit by the kindness we share to others. God has instructed us all to give to those less fortunate than ourselves. Bless all of you who have the heart of God.

lender.name: Snerta
lender.loan_because: We want raise standard of living within various communities around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We work with organizations and local councils to provide solutions for the social housing community in the United Kingdom.

lender.name: Yoko
lender.loan_because: We can have a big impact with a small amount of money for the sustainable world.

lender.name: Carm
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I hope I am helping people and their families to be happier and healthier.
lender.occupational_info: I help military veterans who have been emotionally injured by war.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: It is a small step, but a step in the right direction.
lender.occupational_info: http://www.idsia.ch/~tom/

lender.name: Yoko
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who want to realize their vision.
lender.occupational_info: I coach people to realize their vision. My mission is to realize my clients' goals together with them.

lender.name: Ron
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals, teams and entire organisations better manage their knowledge (knowledge management)

lender.name: Kathi
lender.loan_because: it's why we're here on this planet, to be there for each other. We're all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently at home caring for our 2 young children. When I return to work, I will be assisting injured people to regain their movement and independence.

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: It is nice to give others the opportunity to make their dreams come true and give them a new start on life.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.occupational_info: I find actors for television commercials, print , voice overs and TV shows as well as films.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed and want to share the joy.

lender.name: JML
lender.loan_because: It sounded like an interesting way to lend money to people without being rich.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I have worked very hard helping my husband establish a successful business. I have been very blessed and want to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: I do sales, bookkeeping, marketing, and general management of our family business.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to help others.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I care...

lender.name: Smik
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at Bucknell University in Lewisburg, Pennsylvania majoring in Computer Science.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: It is a pleasure to make a small connection with others across the world and to think that money I earn here in the USA can help these hardworking people make a better life for themselves and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I write about science, medicine, health and the people who work in these fields.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I believe giving a little can help a LOT.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies sell products.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: It is so exciting to support someone across the globe who can enhance their business with such a small amount of money.

lender.name: Vicky
lender.loan_because: I can help someone
lender.occupational_info: work for a chiropractor.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: There are people in the world that need this money more than I. I live in a country where I am fortunate enough to have my needs fulfilled & still have something to give to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Presbyterian/St. Luke's Hospital in Denver where I am responsible for the ordering & stocking of medical supplies for 19 rooms in the Main O.R.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I wanted to try it out and see what would happen.
lender.occupational_info: I forecast the weather for airports.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: There were times in college when I had to borrow quarters from friends just to eat lunch. This is one way to pay forward for all those who helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my 2 yr old son and manage the house while my husband works long hours as an engineer.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I believe micro finance is an effective tool for empowering individuals and improving communities around the world.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I help our company's senior managers by improving our company's processes, reports and tools.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much, and believe that it is right and just to provide economic opportunities for people throughout the world that may not otherwise have access to credit.

lender.name: ruby
lender.occupational_info: I design buildings.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupation: Financial and Life Coach/The Altrupreneur Center

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I want to help others increase the quality of life in their community, without making a profit from it.
lender.occupational_info: I am an electrical engineer in the Seattle, WA area. I mostly work on projects through the Seatac airport designing electrical systems. I hope to work more exclusively on sustainable design, specifically through the LEED program.

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: I know that when everyone who spends money on frivolous things knows the pleasure of giving to those less fortunate, everyone will have a more joyous life

lender.name: Pasi Havia
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting other people's businesses for making their lives better.

lender.name: Lokesh
lender.loan_because: It helps the honest entrepreneurs achieve their dream.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: People who want to work deserve a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: Organization working with people with disabilities achieve maximum independence and equal community access.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help someone less fortunate than myself. All of us can help someone make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies to find safe new medications for all areas of ones lives by doing clinical trials with patients testing the new medication.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate and want to share my good fortune with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a geophysicist studying earthquakes in southern California.

lender.name: JoEllen
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children in a public elementary school.

lender.name: Corky
lender.loan_because: I believe we are all connected in some way. Helping others is the same as helping yourself.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a voice actor for radio and tv. I am one of those big voices that you hear, but never see on commercials and documentary films.

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help.
lender.occupational_info: I encourage and empower people to change their lives through education.

lender.name: Kris & Random
lender.loan_because: These entrepreneurs are inspiring!
lender.occupational_info: Random is a High School History Teacher and Kris works in business in the healthcare technology field.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I started as a Kiva translator and just wanted to get more involved
lender.occupational_info: accountant

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It's nice to know I can help even though I am so far away.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: it's fun!
lender.occupational_info: I recruit for finance and accounting jobs in the Los Angeles area.

lender.name: Cherie
lender.loan_because: Hopefully this will have a ripple effect and help to empower and foster entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate special events and programs for corporations.

lender.name: Tuppy
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate to be living in Canada and I want to help people. I can relate to small business owners because I am trying to do the same thing with my photography business.
lender.occupational_info: I work in publishing sports magazines - specifically golf and hockey. I also have a 2nd business as a photographer and sell my photographs onto greeting cards.

lender.name: Vicky, Gabby & Mike
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to empower people.

lender.name: Claire et Greg
lender.occupational_info: Teacher for one of us (Greg) and librarian for the other one (Claire).

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Judith Chapman
lender.loan_because: Kiva has made it possible.
lender.occupational_info: The stars of Daytime TV and Happy Hour Productions performed "The Trial of the Catonsville 9." They gave of their time and donated all of the money raised from tickets sold to Kiva. For more about the play, go to judithchapman.com.

lender.name: Lynette
lender.loan_because: I have the means to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I help get stories in the newspaper and on television and radio.

lender.name: Joachim
lender.loan_because: It´s lovely to help,even in small portions. God bless Kiva!!

lender.name: Binal & Brijesh
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance at life and not everyone is born with the resources that many of us have. As more people help others to give hope, the better this world will become overtime.

lender.name: Kacia
lender.loan_because: Did you know that experts agree that the world does in fact produce enough food for everyone on the planet?! Some where along the way we have not properly distributed what we have been charged to take care of. Let's even things out a bit, shall we?:)
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people.

lender.name: Mary and Barry
lender.loan_because: I believe!
lender.occupational_info: We build and sell houses.

lender.name: Cliff
lender.loan_because: It seems like an incredibly easy way to help someone in the developing world improve their lives. We have such privilege in this country, it is eye-opening how much $25 means for someone in Nigeria.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I think everybody deserves a better life, and it is a pleasure to help in a small way. I hope I can do this over and over for a long time.Good luck to all involved!
lender.occupational_info: Through play, in the home of an imaginary wacky scientist, I teach people from 1-103 how to do simple experiments and learn something new every day. A very satisfying job....

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: giving people a chance to be better allows them a chance to offer others a chance to be better-
lender.occupational_info: I have been a public school teacher for 30 years

lender.name: Chris and Jill
lender.loan_because: I believe in the common spirit of humanity, and the idea of self reliance. I believe in Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: As a distributor of MonaVie I spread the message of better health and the opportunity of personal wealth through MonaVie. I intend to utilize the wealth obtained through MonaVie to fund additional loans with Kiva!

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life. If I have the ability to help someone then it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that the telephones in our company work - every day - all day. We have almost 10,000 employees world wide.

lender.name: Per & Tim
lender.loan_because: we wish to make a difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: Per is the chief conservator at a midsize museum where he cares for a cultural heritage collection. Tim is a director in a large company, where he helps his team to grow and succeed.

lender.name: Elisabeth & Family
lender.loan_because: This is a family thing. We pick out the loans together. We think that the loans we make through Kiva may be the best thing we ever do. It's made it so easy to "reach out and touch someone". We travel the world and meet people like the Kiva entrepreneurs all the time. But we were never able to fund whole projects on our own. This has made it possible. Thanks, Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: My husband works to make it impossible for someone to steal your identity with a computer, I pay the bills for a bunch of people who help the homeless and people looking for a job, and my daughter is in high school and volunteers at our local library.

lender.name: Shad B
lender.loan_because: Microcredit is one of the most efficient and direct ways of helping people in developing countries improve their lives. I want to do my small part to help make the world a better place.

lender.name: Andi
lender.occupational_info: Human Services

lender.name: mccardey
lender.loan_because: KIVA makes it so easy :)
lender.occupational_info: writer

lender.name: Gwen & Gene
lender.loan_because: We care. We want to help others to be able to provide for their families. We are blessed and we want to pay it forward!
lender.occupational_info: We help people start their own homebased business in the U.S. and 13 other countries.

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: I care about the developing world and I know exactly how I am helping. Thanks KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: Mathematician

lender.name: Katie
lender.occupational_info: I teach High School

lender.name: ESEM.SK
lender.loan_because: let's make the world better
lender.occupational_info: iOS, Windows Phone 7, Android application development webdesign localisation microblogging Chinese social network marketing SEO PPC advertising e-commerce

lender.name: Susanna
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be born in a prosperous, wealthy nation. God has blessed me with an abundance, and it is my duty to share what resources I have with those who have less. I believe that Kiva's loans can do great things because the money initially offered will help expand a business and better a life. When the loan is repaid, those same funds can be used again to help others. I hope that through this website I can maximize the benefit of what I have to give.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I wish to help others achieve their dreams, or just have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Work in Enrollment Office for Youth Programs (camps) and Adult Adventure programs.

lender.name: Aia
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: chisara
lender.loan_because: Don't feed me fish for one day; teach me how to fish and I will feed my self for many a day! I LOVE that saying and its philosophy has guided me throughout my life. I am self-employed and I admire those who strive to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I defend the down-trodden in courts. I fight for the rights of those who have been wrongly injured. I am an employment law and civil rights attorney. I derive great satisfaction in leveling the playing field!

lender.name: Globe Runners
lender.loan_because:
我們都是一家人。 有能力就幫忙。
Life is hard for many children around the world. We are grateful that we have the opportunity to make their lives easier in some way.
"Comenzar juntos es el Principio. Mantenerse juntos es el Progreso. Trabajar juntos es el Exito."
Viva la comunidad solidaria!

lender.name: Beth & Mike
lender.loan_because: We like to help people help themselves . . .

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.

lender.name: Billy
lender.occupation: Director, EKU Center for Environmental Education
lender.occupational_info: I work to educate teachers how to use the environment to teach in all subject areas.

lender.name: Sim Yoe
lender.loan_because: Helping someone in need is one of my goals in life

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I try and help companies become more efficient and save money.

lender.name: Shelli
lender.loan_because: I'd like for others to acheive their dreams as I have been fortunate in acheiving many of mine.
lender.occupational_info: My counseling practice offers support, guidance and relief to clients who have life struggles/problems. My specialization is working with survivors of trauma, particularly domestic abuse.

lender.name: Arwen
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to live a happy , healthy life and I think everyone should have the right to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am a performer based in San Francisco, California. I act, sing, dance and do aerial circus.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people and sometimes the problems of the world seem too big for one person, but with these loans anyone can make a contribution and change the world.

lender.name: The Cookson Family
lender.loan_because: responsible credit is the fuel for economic development.
lender.occupational_info: I bring people and expertise together to create value.

lender.name: Carmen
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life. I like KIVA because it helps people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I design software for business applications.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I care. I feel that what goes around comes around. I would want someone to help me if I needed it. The Golden Rule.."Treat Others the Way You Want to be Treated". Wouldn't this world be a different place if everyone obeyed this rule?
lender.occupational_info: I am a sixth grade teacher in a Catholic school. I share with my students the importance of caring for our fellow human beings. We are responsible for each other.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: What is a non-fat latte for me, may be a life changing opportunity for another. It's all relative. Money. Happiness. Freedom. Peace. All of it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graphic designer. I design logos, brochures, magazines and websites.

lender.name: Bill and Kathy
lender.loan_because: We want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an automotive finance and insurance consulting firm and Kathy works for a home builder.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I have been very lucky in my life and would like to help people that did not have the advantages I did.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired high school automotive mechanics teacher.
